summary: Utility script that processes Open Library PostgreSQL data exports, converting them into several JSON dump formats (raw dump with key/type/json rows and expanded book dump for Solr) and offering helper routines for reading, writing, splitting by type, merging, and commandâ€‘line execution.
business_intent: Facilitate creation of structured JSON representations of Open Library records from database dumps to support downstream workflows such as search indexing and data analysis.
